requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 2.68Ghz / AMD II x4 945 3.0Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 2GB/AMD Radeon 6870 HD 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11.6 or higher required
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
